It is insanity

You really have it out for loot boxes aye xD
Im guessing you'd **HATE** Elder Scrolls Online's store....  

I agree that lootboxes are a horrible way for purchases to be made, they just feel yuck for the players. So while they may make you a shit-ton of money in the short term, you eventually turn your player base against you_ (which surprise surprise is starting to happen)_.

I think when league's hextech chests came out, they were alright. 
They were more like a little chance for players to get freebies just by playing a lot of games.
But now it is just a full-blown revenue stream, and everything _(events, missions, exclusive skins, etc)_ now goes through the boxes and it's just a slippery slope.

You don't want to end up like ESO, where if its not in a loot box, its not worth buying, and if it is in a loot box, you have to buy 100 boxes to actually get enough _'better luck next time'_ points to purchase it.
